content: Hey, i downloaded a Vonk server and want now to prepare CapabilityStatement. How can i do it? Please, i'm a Beginner and need your Help. Thanx

Please see http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Rules_for_asking_questions. If you really need help to characterise your question further, consider spending some time with the free or commercially available tutorials

Hi there! Thanks for trying out Vonk.
Could you please elaborate a bit more on what exactly you are trying to add to your CapabilityStatement?
For more information, please have a look at the documentation here: http://docs.simplifier.net/vonk/
